entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story, a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends and classmates at Hogwarts.

entities.name: baruffio
entities.description: Baruffio is a Ravenclaw student who offers his Brain Elixir to Harry and Ron.

entities.name: eddie carmichael
entities.description: Eddie Carmichael is a Ravenclaw sixth year student who claims that Baruffio's Brain Elixir helped him get nine Outstanding O.W.L.s.

entities.name: harold dingle
entities.description: Harold Dingle is someone who sells powdered dragon claw, which Hermione confiscates.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends and classmates at Hogwarts.
Hermione confiscates Baruffio's Brain Elixir from him.
Ron promises to reimburse Harry for his half of the Brain Elixir.
Hermione confiscates Baruffio's Brain Elixir from Eddie Carmichael.
Harry and Ron are tempted by the offer of Baruffio's Brain Elixir.
